verbose_text: In addition, disruption of TGFbeta XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR, D-raf XREF_BIBR, and EGFR XREF_BIBR pathways in the somatic cyst cells upregulate germ cell divisions and block further differentiation.
evidence: EGFR XREF_BIBR  pathways in the somatic cyst cells upregulate germ cell divisions and block further differentiation
